description:
Dreaming of spending time on the water but have no space to store a boat? Oru Kayak solved this issue by creating folding kayaks that take 5 minutes to assemble. The Inlet provides the stability that new paddlers will appreciate and is long enough for the more experienced to paddle swiftly on flatwater to their destination. With a plastic rated for 20,000 fold cycles, you don't have to worry about it breaking down.

  • Foldable polypropylene construction withstands being folded and unfolded thousands of times
  • Buckle closure system lets you set it up quickly without any tools
  • Roomy cockpit accommodates a wide range of paddler sizes and allows for easy entry and exit
  • Removeable bulkheads provide storage and structure
  • Padded seat with adjustable footrest and backrest for comfort on longer paddles
  • Intended for use in calm rivers, lakes, and streams
  • Folds down to a portable, stowable box that you can fit in a trunk or with checked luggage
  • Box dimensions: 107 x 46 x 25 cm
name: Oru Kayaks Inlet Folding Kayak
